title: Saeima speaker Mieriņa signs up to Trump flattery letter
summary_full: Saeima Speaker Daiga Mieriņa (Greens and Farmers Union) has signed a letter to the Nobel Prize Committee, urging that the 2025 Peace Prize be awarded to US President Donald Trump, reports the Latvian news weekly, "Ir".
